conversation.message: I am highly impressed by Company_C's mission and believe my skills align perfectly with your requirements. I am formally submitting my application now, as Company_C is my top preference.
conversation.thought: My objective is to secure my highest possible preference. My top choice is Company_C. In Round 1, the standard stable matching algorithm dictates that job seekers propose to their most preferred company. Assuming all other seekers follow this strategy (Seeker_A->C_B, Seeker_B->C_A, Seeker_D->C_D, Seeker_E->C_E), I will be the only applicant to Company_C. Although I am ranked 3rd on Company_C's priority list, since capacity is 1 and I am the only applicant, Company_C should accept my application. Therefore, I will formally apply to Company_C.
